ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Chants vs. Melee (was Bards forgotten again.... )
ygData.msgSnippet: Grouping with a good enchanter can be frustrating. You can t sing damage songs because they break Mezz. You can t sing Anthem because it overwrites alacraty
ygData.messageBody:
Grouping with a good enchanter can be frustrating.
You can't sing damage songs because they break Mezz.
You can't sing Anthem because it overwrites alacraty
(spelling). You can't use Largo's or chain because
that interferes with their Slow spell.

I usually sing COB, Psalm or warmth and Hymm. Not
much else you can do at that point...


Stupid bard, Shada? I think not -- I always make a
point of reading certain posts and yours are always
among those.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife

--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<garramone@...> wrote:
> you're right, if there is an enchanter or shaman or
> both in the group then
> there is very little for a bard to do to buff the
> group, if anything but
> mana. that's a situation where you can do some song
> damage (or take a

>
> Shada
>
